examples: this thing has got to end
how could you do such a thing?
a funny thing happened on the way to the...
it is none of your affair

definitions.text: a statement regarded as an object
examples: to say the same thing in other terms
how can you say such a thing?

definitions.text: an entity that is not named specifically
examples: I couldn't tell what the thing was

definitions.text: any attribute or quality considered as having its own existence
examples: the thing I like about her is ...
the thing is to stay in bounds

definitions.text: a persistent illogical feeling of desire or aversion
examples: he has a thing about seafood
she has a thing about him
